Cliffjumper's one damaged eye was receiving his attempts to hypnotise him,
but it didnt receive the information in his brain properly, his other eye
was focused on the monster, "Okay then, your story does make sense" he puts
his gun away, and his hand out, to help up the damaged robot.


OOC: Out of curiousity, how tall is Hallucigen? Cliffjumper is mini just so
you know.
